data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Veracruz.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Veracruz, Mexico
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Veracruz, Mexico honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Veracruz, Mexico.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 739,702 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jew, Spanish-speaking people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jew, Spanish-speaking people.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Veracruz to agree with you and with one another.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Veracruz, Mexico.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Veracruz, Mexico that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
